articles.description: Despite a disappointing domestic campaign, Borussia Dortmund are one game away from becoming European champions for the second time.
articles.title: Champions League: Borussia Dortmund confident of final success

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe will have dreamed that his final Champions League act as a Paris St-Germain player would have been lifting the trophy at Wembley. The reality was very different.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe suffers final PSG failure in the Champions League

articles.description: A system designed to uncover cheats in tennis is under sharpened scrutiny after former Wimbledon champion Simona Halep's ban for a doping offence.
articles.title: Is tennis catching doping cheats or ruining careers?

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Spain to find out why Real Madrid have radically remodelled their iconic Bernabeu stadium, as they aim to stay ahead of the competition in European football.
articles.title: The new Bernabeu: Can Real Madrid's stadium keep them at the top?

articles.description: Diego Maradona's "stolen" Golden Ball trophy, awarded for being named the best player at the 1986 World Cup, has been found and will go to auction in France on 6 June.
articles.title: Diego Maradona: 'Stolen' Golden Ball to be auctioned off

articles.description: Scotland will face England at this autumn’s Women’s T20 World Cup as they lose against Sri Lanka in the final of the ICC qualifier.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Scotland to face England in tournament

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit praises the advice of quarterback Patrick Mahomes as he continues his transition to American football with the Kansas City Chiefs.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Kansas City Chiefs convert praises advice of quarterback Patrick Mahomes

articles.description: Real Madrid won the La Liga title at the weekend, but defender Dani Carvajal says there were no celebrations as they target the Champions League final.
articles.title: No title party for Real before Bayern - Carvajal

articles.description: Manchester United intend to sack Erik ten Hag at the end of the season, Thomas Tuchel is interested in the Old Trafford job, plus more.
articles.title: Man Utd to sack Ten Hag at end of season - Wednesday's gossip

articles.description: Kyren Wilson compared himself to Rocky Balboa and says he wants to “build a legacy” in snooker after claiming his first world title.
articles.title: World Championship: Kyren Wilson wants to 'build legacy' after winning first world title
